title: What happened to my emails
text: Love using gmail, but I often run into not being able to access my older emails that I NEVER deleted! Also, I think that being able to create groups for your emails should be a little easier instead of having to copy and paste the names repeatedly would be helpful.

title: Too many ads
text: When I first started a Gmail account, ads were never nestled in between emails. Auto-complete should never be on automatically and it takes too much fiddling to turn it off. It‚Äôs also now too difficult to sign into my gmail accounts. Security is important, but it‚Äôs so rigorous that it locks me out much of the time. Also, WHY is my cell phone getting involved in logging into my email account on my COMPUTER. It should never take multiple devices just to sign in. And why is the unsubscribe button only available for SOME emails. ALSO ALSO, the search algorithm in Gmail is a joke.

title: Ads central
text:
How could such an amazing app turn into absolute garbage? Why am I presented with ads every third email that I have and why is every third ad occupy more than half of my screen with thumbnails. Why? As a paying subscriber to many Google services, I think this is unacceptable. 
Please remove these obnoxious ads and let me continue to enjoy reading my email. 
At least remove the ads for customers like myself that pay over $50 a month for all of your services.

title: a recent version was broken and support here is not useful
text:
I had the following problem for about a week which is now fixed via the most recent update:

if i select a msg and it opens in right pane on ipad, and then i leave app and come back the msg is expanded and i cannot exit the message or navigate at all, have to force close app just to use it again. New bug as of a version here in mid/late february‚Ä¶.but is killer, needs fixing ASAP

I received a developer response here on the apple store for my review which had absolutely nothing to do with my issue.  A link that had me check if I was connected to internet‚Ä¶.are you kidding me?  Did you read my symptoms?    Multiple other people had posted reviews citing the same bug at the time.  Instead of testing for a bug or acknowledging it support was happy to waste my time with total nonsense that was clearly unrelated.   So I have increased stars to reflect the quality of the (now fixed) app but left a couple off to reflect quality of support.

title: Lots of exploration to play with.
text:
I do rather enjoy google and finding how it can more seamlessly integrate with life.

Google makes a lot very simple and cautiously I do like to play around with more advanced features that, in hindsight I should have known; however with small steps I do find google responds better to my personal preferences. Unsure if this is because of AI, my own preferences, both, or another option I‚Äôm not aware of yet!

Thank you Google!

title: Works well but has some annoyances
text: Works well overall, but some things are annoying: Doesn't seem to have a way to change font, etc. (The web app does.) Doesn't seem to have a way to delete just 1 message out of a thread. (The web app does.) Doesn't seem to have a way to select how much of a message to load before clipping. (Same problem in the web app.)  Unlike the web app, the iOS app doesn't seem to have a way to delete a subset of messages in a thread.

title: Personal email throttled?
text: I can receive a commercial based email immediately but if it‚Äôs a personal email it can take days? Why are my personal emails being throttled?

title: Productivity enhanced
text: This app has definitely been a key tool for me and my productivity. It‚Äôs always been seamless and the platform is easy to use. I‚Äôve experienced no glitches and my most recent update included a way to ‚Äúselect all‚Äù for when I need to clear space quickly.
